title: piRaviyadhanaaR
sahitya:
piRaviyadanaaR payanen mahaa

prabuvoruvan uNDenrEr

pozhudum nambaa naastiga

(piravi)



anupallavi



piRavi taLaiyaruttup pEraananda maLikkum

perumaaL tiruvananda sayanan terisiyaada

(piravi)



caraNam



uyigaLellaam paDaikkum ayanayun daruntiru

undi kamalanaam aananda padmanaabanai

viyanuRum gOpuramum shreebali maNDapamum

mEvu poRkambamoDu kOvilai cEviyaap pun

(piravi)
